title: Computer Science Student
description: I'm a student majoring in computer science with a specialization in software engineering at University of Bielsko-Biala.

title: Beginner in Game Dev
description: I have recently become interested in game dev, and am currently learning how to use the Unity engine. I am still creating a game project that is under development on the Godot engine.

title: Beginner in Blender
description: I am trying to explore 3D object modeling using Blender.

title: Beginner in drawing
description: In addition, I am trying to develop drawing skills as a more creative hobby.

title: And vector graphisc amateur
description: I also tried my hand at creating vector icons.
